newsitem.title: MACEDONIA: ONE COMPANY TRADES ON MACEDONIA STOCK EXCHANGE.
newsitem.headline: ONE COMPANY TRADES ON MACEDONIA STOCK EXCHANGE.

text.p: Turnover amounted to 2.852 million denars at Tuesday's session of the Macedonian Stock Exchange as only one company traded, the exchange said.
Alkaloid joint stock company sold 2,940 shares at 970 denars, unchanged from Thursday's close and below par of 2,424 denars.
Figures for Thursday's volume and turnover were not available.
Listed companies trade in two floor sessions. The exchange trades on Tuesday and Thursday.
